jobDescription: BHSI is seeking a Reporting Data Analyst to join our Actuarial Analytics Team. We are looking for an individual who has both an ability to excel and an excellence of character. Our culture is innovative and fast-paced, and this position will be the perfect fit for an individual who is intellectually curious, self-motivated and a collaborative team member.  The Reporting Data Analyst in this role will engage in a wide variety of projects central to enhancing and growing the Actuarial department’s data analysis and reporting, including working with actuaries and business partners in various reporting initiatives to establish requirements and meet deliverables to support data-driven decision making. A candidate with a passion for problem solving with data and a desire to constantly learn and
